item.title: Using vRA with VMC on AWS: Getting Started
item.author: Author
item.description: vRealize Automation can be used to automate the deployment of workloads to a VMware Cloud on AWS Software-Defined Data Center (SDDC). Let’s learn how you can get started with using vRealize Automation with VMware Cloud on AWS. Demo Product Versions vRA Cloud VMware Cloud on AWS (SDDC version 1.14v4) Prerequisites VMC on AWS: SDDC deployed Access to the SDDC Process Overview Deploy a vRA Cloud Proxy in the VMC on AWS SDDC.
